personalInfo.splInterest: Working out, cooking, hanging out with friends

tourBios.intlVics: (4) 2013 Grand Cypress [NGA], 2014 Disney Palm Classic [eGolf], 2015 State Open of Virginia [VirginiaStGA], Kandy Waters Memorial Classic [SwingThought]
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played 7 tournaments on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, where he recorded a win and four top-25s on 6 cuts made to finish 21st on the Order of Merit… Shot 67-68-68-68 to win at the Roberto De Vicenzo Punta del Este Open at Club del Lago Golf in Maldonado, Uruguay in November. Entered the final round in a three-way tie for the lead and ended up winning by two over pairing partner and former college roommate Rafa Campos… Missed the cut at the Rex Hospital Open on his only start of the year on the Web.com Tour… Shot 66-68-70 to win the State Open of Virginia by six strokes at Ballyhack Golf Club in July… Won the Kandy Waters Memorial Classic in a playoff on the Swing Thought Tour in August.

2014: Finished T114 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December... Finished T56 at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Sebring, FL Q-School in January to miss on his change of earning Tour status… Also failed to earn PGA TOUR Canada status with a T70 at the Q-School at Oak Valley… Played 17 events the eGolf Tour and recorded one win, at the Disney Palm Classic in January.

2013: Won an NGA Tour event at Grand Cypress for his first victory as a professional.

2011: Made two PGA TOUR starts, both missed cuts at Wells Fargo Championship and The Greenbrier Classic.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at Virginia Commonwealth University… Was named 2009 Colonial Athletic Association Player of the Year.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory is playing 45 holes a day at his local nine-hole course every weekend…First-tee entrance song would be "Juicy" by the The Notorious B.I.G…Biggest thrill outside of golf is graduating from college…Favorite course he's played is Oak Hill…Once played golf with Roger Clemens at Roanoke CC…Best sporting event attended was the San Francisco 49ers-Carolina Panthers playoff game in 2014…Dream foursome includes Ken Griffey Jr., Jimmy Fallon and Jerry Rice…Would like to trade places with Daniel Tosh or Dane Cook for a day…Not many people know he has never eaten red meat and that his diet consists of fish and poultry…Is involved with the Boys & Girls Club of Roanoke Valley because he "enjoys helping local kids who need some guidance."…Would like to be on "The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon" because "he is hysterical and talented."…Was named after a spiritual master (Lord Lanto) and is very thankful for his balanced upbringing…Biggest thrill in golf was qualifying for the 2011 Wells Fargo Championship in his first attempt at Monday qualifying…Twitter name is @Thelanto61

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished T3 at the eGolf Tour's Mimosa Hills Open in late-June in Morganton, N.C. Shot rounds of 65-67-66-65 to end the Mimosa Hills G&CC event three strokes behind winner Kevin McLister.

2014: Finished T114 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Played the eGolf Tour in 17 events and recorded one win, at the Disney Palm Classic in January.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named the 2009 Colonial Athletic Association Player of the Year…Played in the 2011 Wells Fargo Championship and the Greenbrier Classic for his first PGA TOUR appearances. Missed the cut in both tournaments.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri in 2016 is T22nd at the 85 Abierto OSDE del Centro presentado por FiberCorp.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T52nd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Latinoamérica.
